key_aspects: New component file for displaying offline status
Uses MUI Alert component for styling
Integrates with NetworkContext for online/offline state

patterns_discovered.description: Uses MUI's styled() function to create customized components with theme integration
Component consumes NetworkContext to determine online/offline status
Uses MUI Slide component for animated entry/exit transitions based on network state
Uses theme z-index utilities for proper layering and fixed positioning

gotchas_discovered.description: Container has pointerEvents: 'none' while Alert has pointerEvents: 'auto' to ensure banner doesn't interfere with page interaction while remaining clickable if needed
Component relies on MUI theme context being available; will fail if theme provider is not set up in parent component tree
Uses mountOnEnter and unmountOnExit on Slide component, which could affect animation timing and component state if NetworkContext updates rapidly

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully created a reusable OfflineBanner component that displays when network is unavailable, with smooth slide animation and proper styling using MUI Alert component

recommendations.suggestion: Add dismissible variant with onClose callback to allow users to hide banner temporarily
Add unit tests for banner visibility toggling based on NetworkContext state changes
Consider adding role='alert' and aria-live attributes to StyledAlert for screen reader announcements
Add fallback message or default styling in case theme is unavailable
